```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

Here is some inline code `r 2 + 2`

```{r, starwars-plot,fig.cap="A ggplot of starwars stuff", warning=FALSE}
starwars %>% 
  filter(species == "Human") %>%
  ggplot() +
  aes(x=height,
      y=mass) +
  geom_point()
```

We can see in Figure \@ref(fig:starwars-plot)

```{r, starwars-tbl}
starwars %>% 
  filter(species == "Human") %>%
  select(name,
         height,
         mass,
         homeworld) %>%
  knitr::kable(caption="A knit kable table of  starwars data")
```

We can see in Table \@ref(tab:starwars-tbl)
